title: AppConfig Feature Flag with CDK (Typescript)
description: Set up AppConfig Feature Flag with CDK and read the status from Appconfig Extension for Lambda

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This project demonstrates how to implement a feture flag into AppConfig using AWS CDK.
Also this demonstrates the usage of AppConfig extension for Lambda, to retrieve the status of the Feature Flag.

bullets.text: AppConfig region specific Lambda Extension versions

text: cdk deploy --all --parameters appConfigExtensionArn='[AppConfig Extension version ARN]'
See the Github repo for detailed testing instructions.
